item.description:
Let's try dinner again at Barnes KBAF. Short 50 nm hop. New restaurant and cheap fuel.... Why not? An easy dinner out.

They have an awesome outdoor dining area over looking the runways. I can make reservations up there if possible once we get all RSVP's in.

If we leave by about 5:30, we can enjoy a sunset flight back!

Need a ride? Let's see who's flying or back-seat-flying?
Usually plenty of room

http://www.airnav.com...
item.why: Good place to eat and fly to.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Dinner to Barnes ... Outdoor dining ???
